Sentencas: The opportunity of using two rare-earth metal oxides in an aluminosilicate glass for seal applications was investigated in this work.
Titulo: Fabrication and sealing performance of rue-earth containing glass-ceramic seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Substitution of La2O3 with Y2O3 in the system changed thermal and physical properties such as transition temperature, flowing behavior, and thermal expansion.
Titulo: Fabrication and sealing performance of rue-earth containing glass-ceramic seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The strongly bound structural unit in the network affected glass healing capability with a slower healing response.
Titulo: Fabrication and sealing performance of rue-earth containing glass-ceramic seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Higher activation energy ( >= 20%) was required for Y2O3 containing glass, consistent with in-situ XRD results which revealed its amorphous nature is maintained similar to 75 degrees C above the other glass.
Titulo: Fabrication and sealing performance of rue-earth containing glass-ceramic seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Despite containing strontium in the composition, well bonded interface was obtained in contact with 8YSZ and SS430 ferritic stainless steel.
Titulo: Fabrication and sealing performance of rue-earth containing glass-ceramic seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The hermeticity of the glass seals was maintained after 100 h isothermal aging at 800 degrees C. Also the OCV showed insignificant fluctuations with stable average values after 24 thermal cycles.
Titulo: Fabrication and sealing performance of rue-earth containing glass-ceramic seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell applications
